name: Supernova Alpha
description:
Supernova is a classic shooter inspired game. This is the alpha release.

After playing the game, please leave some feedback at https://forms.office.com/r/t5JA98r9hJ

This game was built by TSE Group 28.

How to Play?

Use W, A, S, and D for movement, and the mouse to look left and right.

Press the 1 key to use the pistol, press the 2 key to use the rocket launcher (you will need to unlock this by killing the first boss)

Press E to interact with things.

Left Control is for crouching.

Space makes you Jump!

ALT+F4 is the only way to exit past the main menu.

Please bare in mind this is still in development and is subject to change.

Resources from Other Places

  • Enemies Sprites from Doom (Temp)
  • Various Sound Effects from freesound.org
  • Tile Set from tileable.co

This project is Open Source! Check the code on our GitHub.
